verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> shadowing <S%H6767><s%> with wings, <S%H3671><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia: <S%H3568><s%>

That sends <S%H7971><s%> ambassadors <S%H6735><s%> by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> even in vessels <S%H3627><s%> of bulrushes <S%H1573><s%> on the waters, <S%H4325><s%> saying, Go, <S%H3212><s%> you swift <S%H7031><s%> messengers, <S%H4397><s%> to a nation <S%H1471><s%> scattered <S%H4900><s%> and peeled, <S%H4178><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning <S%H1931><s%> till now; <S%H1973><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> meted <S%H6978><s%> out and trodden <S%H4001><s%> down, whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> have spoiled! <S%H958><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> you inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world, <S%H8398><s%> and dwellers <S%H7931><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> you, when he lifts <S%H5375><s%> up an ensign <S%H5251><s%> on the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> and when he blows <S%H8628><s%> a trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> you.

For so <S%H3541><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, I will take my rest, <S%H8252><s%> and I will consider <S%H5027><s%> in my dwelling <S%H4349><s%> place like a clear <S%H6703><s%> heat <S%H2527><s%> on herbs, <S%H219><s%> and like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> in the heat <S%H2527><s%> of harvest. <S%H7105><s%>

For before <S%H6440><s%> the harvest, <S%H7105><s%> when the bud <S%H6525><s%> is perfect, <S%H8552><s%> and the sour <S%H1155><s%> grape <S%H1155><s%> is ripening <S%H1580><s%> in the flower, <S%H5328><s%> he shall both cut <S%H3772><s%> off the sprigs <S%H2150><s%> with pruning <S%H4211><s%> hooks, and take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> and cut <S%H8456><s%> down the branches. <S%H5189><s%>

They shall be left <S%H5800><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to the fowls <S%H5861><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> and the fowls <S%H5861><s%> shall summer <S%H6972><s%> on them, and all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall winter <S%H2778><s%> on them.

In that time <S%H6256><s%> shall the present <S%H7862><s%> be brought <S%H2986><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> of a people <S%H5971><s%> scattered <S%H4900><s%> and peeled, <S%H4178><s%> and from a people <S%H5971><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning <S%H1931><s%> till now; <S%H1973><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> meted <S%H6978><s%> out and trodden <S%H4001><s%> under foot, <S%H4001><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> have spoiled, <S%H958><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
